channel.title: (help) please help to fix the connection error retrying of my client i tryed all
channel.description:
hello i tryed all guides but i cant get it to work my client in some way it cant connect to the cache im using vista
i get the error connection error retrying in 1,2,3,4,5 and more please help
i will appreaciate that much because im really getting mad i tryed everything every tutorial but cant get it working
